snippet.title: Zombie Madness (Intellivision, 2020)
snippet.description:
This is an Intellivision game I made for Halloween 2019, and now you can order an enhanced version in cartridge + optional box from: http://www.2600connection.com/features/zombie/zombie.html

It's a quiet Halloween morning when your son announces that he just destroyed your neighbor's shed! But strangely the neighbor wasn't all that angry, instead he gave your son a juju.

Instantly your house is invaded by hordes of juju zombies and your family is so terrified of them that you must carry each of them to the exits, but you can only carry one at a time.

If the zombies touch you, you'll become a Zombie Dad/Mom, and you'll still die pretty soon unless you eat some human flesh.

The level is complete when your family is saved or all eaten, your choice. Once in a while, a zombie will turn onto a banshee, or red and giant!!!
